projects.title: 8-puzzle
projects.description: 8-puzzle is a 3x3 sliding-tile puzzle game with a built-in solver that uses BFS, greedy best-first search, and the A* algorithm.

projects.title: Financial Tracker
projects.description: Financial Tracker is a modern, password-free finance app with Magic-Link authentication. Effortlessly monitor your spending—add, edit, and delete transactions—and customize your dashboard with a default date range, display name, and avatar.

projects.title: Grocery store checkout simulation
projects.description: A discrete-event simulation written in Python that investigates the trade-offs between traditional cashier-operated lanes and self-service checkouts in a grocery store.
